title: Breaking dawn wedding invitation typeface
author: quayam.abbas

comments.content: It must be **[Sackers Classic Roman (Light)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114324/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Sackers%20Classic%20Roman%20Std%20-%20Light&fid=9a663f03edd650d03891bc30889a437d&fsize=60&text=Isabella%20Marie%20Swan%20Cullen&wrap=2)** by Monotype
